stories.title: Making a Basic LTI (Learning Tools Intoperability) App (2016)
Will swapping out electric car batteries catch on?
Tesla has the top 3 electric cars in the US, and it’s not even close

stories.text:
We're looking for an affiliate program for our BigCommerce Web store.

We're looking at Refersion for a couple of reasons:

Refersion Pay - automatic payment and tax document processing. I haven't found a comparable service elsewhere.

Highly customizable - we'll be integrating the affiliate program with several systems and need significant customization capability which Refersion has.

Are there any other affiliate program candidates that you're aware of that we should look at?

Thanks.

Tom
stories.title: Ask HN: Affiliate Program Recommendation?
Please stop making Discord servers for things that shouldn't be Discord servers
Fasting boosts stem cells’ regenerative capacity (2018)

stories.text:
I wonder how folks get the most out of HN.

I personally often look at Ask and Show more deeply than Top. I find those to be more interesting to me.

I limit HN to AM bathroom times mostly, but do check it out some days while I work. If I’m unsuccessful at managing distractions or just want a low stress break, it’s a quick way to satisfy.
stories.title: Favorite HN Patterns?
